original: khyad par ni 'di yod de /
analyzed: khyad par ni 'di yod de /
translated: But there is this difference.

original: rnam pa bzhi bzlas pa snga ma gnyis ni slob pa'i 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig go //
analyzed: rnam pa bzhi bzlas pa snga ma gnyis ni slob pa'i 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig go //
translated: The first two repetitions of the four kinds are the eye of wisdom of the learner noble being.

original: phyi ma shos ni mi slob pa'o //
analyzed: phyi ma shos ni mi slob pa'o //
translated: The last is that of the nonlearner.

original: brnyes par bya ba brnyes pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: brnyes par bya ba brnyes pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: And the unsurpassed perfect enlightenment that is to be attained should be understood as the eye of wisdom of the nonlearner.

original: gzhan gyi rgyud la nges par bskyed pa dang / nyid kyis thugs su chud pa la yid ches pa bskyed pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: gzhan gyi rgyud la nges par bskyed pa dang / nyid kyis thugs su chud pa la yid ches pa bskyed pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The generation of conviction in the generation of certainty in the mindstream of others and in one's own understanding is as follows.

original: tshe dang ldan pa kun shes koondi n+ya bcom ldan 'das las thos nas thog mar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i chos kun shes par gyur te /
analyzed: tshe dang ldan pa kun shes koondi n+ya bcom ldan 'das las thos nas thog mar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i chos kun shes par gyur te /
translated: The venerable All-knowing Kau·πá·∏çinya, having heard from the BhagavƒÅn, first generated the knowledge of all phenomena of the four noble truths.

original: dris na yang bdag gis chos kun 'tshal to zhes smras pa dang / de'i 'og tu yang snga ma bzhin du mthar thug pa'i rnam pa dag gi lnga char gyis dgra bcom pa nyid thob ste /
analyzed: dris na yang bdag gis chos kun 'tshal to zhes smras pa dang / de'i 'og tu yang snga ma bzhin du mthar thug pa'i rnam pa dag gi lnga char gyis dgra bcom pa nyid thob ste /
translated: Then, as before, all five of them attained the state of an arhat through the final aspects.

original: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyang bskyed pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i ye shes kyang bskyed pa lta bu'o //
translated: They also generated the wisdom of liberation.

original: de la gzhan dag kyang gzhan gyis rtogs pa la yid ches pa bskyed pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de la gzhan dag kyang gzhan gyis rtogs pa la yid ches pa bskyed pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: In this regard, others generate confidence in the realization of others.

original: bdag gis chos kun shes so zhes kun shes koonda n+ya'i 'jig rten pa'i sems skyes pa yang rig pa kun shes koondi n+yas chos kun shes par gyur to snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i dgongs pa skyes pa yang rig nas sa la gnas pa'i gnod
analyzed: bdag gis chos kun shes so zhes kun shes koonda n+ya'i 'jig rten pa'i sems skyes pa yang rig pa kun shes koondi n+yas chos kun shes par gyur to snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten pa'i dgongs pa skyes pa yang rig nas sa la gnas pa'i gnod
translated: For example, when Kaundinya generated the mundane thought I know all phenomena, the Tathagata generated the mundane thought I know all phenomena, knowing that Kaundinya who knows all knows all phenomena.

original: sbyin rnams kyis sgra brjod nas skad cig yud tsam thang cig de nyid la /
analyzed: sbyin rnams kyis sgra brjod nas skad cig yud tsam thang cig de nyid la /
translated: Then the yakshas who dwell on the ground proclaimed this sound and in that very instant,

original: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra grag par gyur te /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du sgra grag par gyur te /
translated: the sound was heard as far as the Brahma world.

original: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang kun shes koondi n+ya'i rgyud la kun shes pa'i chos nyid mthun par bskor la /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang kun shes koondi n+ya'i rgyud la kun shes pa'i chos nyid mthun par bskor la /
translated: The Bhagavat also set in motion the wheel of the Dharma in the stream of the all-knowing Kau·πá·∏çinya, in conformity with the reality of all-knowing.

original: de yang gzhan dag la mthun par bskor bar 'gyur ba dang / de dag kyang gzhan dag la mthun par bskor bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: de yang gzhan dag la mthun par bskor bar 'gyur ba dang / de dag kyang gzhan dag la mthun par bskor bar 'gyur te /
translated: And that was set in motion in conformity with others, and that also was set in motion in conformity with others.

original: de bas na gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de mthun par bskor ba'i don gyi 'khor lo zhes bya'o //üîΩyang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs @282a * //
analyzed: de bas na gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de mthun par bskor ba'i don gyi 'khor lo zhes bya'o // yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs @282a * //
translated: Therefore, it is called the wheel of the Dharma that is set in motion in conformity with others, in a series from one to another.

original: pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin yin pas na chos kyi 'khor lo'o //
analyzed: pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin yin pas na chos kyi 'khor lo'o //
translated: It is the wheel of the Dharma because it has the nature of the Dharma, such as right view, etc.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: It is like this:

original: 'di ltar tshangs pa zhes bya ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa'i tshig bla dags yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar tshangs pa zhes bya ba 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa'i tshig bla dags yin te /
translated: Thus, ‚ÄúBrahma‚Äù is a designation for the TathƒÅgata, the Arhat.

original: de bas na des bskor ba la tshangs pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
analyzed: de bas na des bskor ba la tshangs pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya'o //
translated: Therefore, that which is set in motion by him is called the wheel of Brahma.

original: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mngon par ma rtogs pa mngon par rtogs par bya ba la ni sbyor ba rnam pa bzhi yod par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi mngon par ma rtogs pa mngon par rtogs par bya ba la ni sbyor ba rnam pa bzhi yod par rig par bya ste /
translated: It should be understood that there are four kinds of application for the realization of the four noble truths that have not been realized.

original: ma thob pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dad pa dang / dad pa'i sgo nas 'dun pa dang / snying thag pa nas 'dun pa'i sgo nas brtson 'grus brtun pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa de yang thabs dang bcas pa'o //
analyzed: ma thob pa thob par bya ba'i phyir dad pa dang / dad pa'i sgo nas 'dun pa dang / snying thag pa nas 'dun pa'i sgo nas brtson 'grus brtun pa dang / brtson 'grus brtsams pa de yang thabs dang bcas pa'o //
translated: And that exertion is also with means.

original: de la dad pa ni mngon par yid ches pa'o //
analyzed: de la dad pa ni mngon par yid ches pa'o //
translated: Faith is full confidence.

original: 'dun pa ni thob par 'dod pa'o //
analyzed: 'dun pa ni thob par 'dod pa'o //
translated: Aspiration is the desire to attain.

original: brtson 'grus ni snga ma bzhin du rnam pa lnga ste /
analyzed: brtson 'grus ni snga ma bzhin du rnam pa lnga ste /
translated: Exertion is as before, of five kinds:

original: mthu dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / spro ba dang ldan pa dang / rtul phod pa brtan pa dang / brtson pa mi 'dor ba'o //
analyzed: mthu dang ldan pa dang / brtson 'grus dang ldan pa dang / spro ba dang ldan pa dang / rtul phod pa brtan pa dang / brtson pa mi 'dor ba'o //
translated: powerful, diligent, enthusiastic, courageous, and not abandoning striving.

original: thabs ni bag yod par bya ba'i phyir brjed ngas pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dran pa dang / bag med pa la nyes dmigs su shes shing yongs su gcod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi shes bzhin dang / de gnyis kyis yongs su zin pa'i bag yod pa ste ;
analyzed: thabs ni bag yod par bya ba'i phyir brjed ngas pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyi dran pa dang / bag med pa la nyes dmigs su shes shing yongs su gcod pa'i mtshan nyid kyi shes bzhin dang / de gnyis kyis yongs su zin pa'i bag yod pa ste ;
translated: The means are mindfulness, which is characterized by non-forgetfulness for the sake of heedfulness, introspection, which is characterized by knowing and cutting off the faults of heedlessness, and heedfulness itself, which is the combination of those two.

original: nyon mongs pa can gyi chos rnams las sems kun du srung ba dang / dge ba bsgom pa la rtog pa'o //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can gyi chos rnams las sems kun du srung ba dang / dge ba bsgom pa la rtog pa'o //
translated: It is the guarding of the mind from defiled things and the cultivation of the wholesome.

original: nad lta bu ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o //üîΩnad kun nas slong ba lta bu ni kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: nad lta bu ni sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'o // nad kun nas slong ba lta bu ni kun 'byung ba'i bden pa'o //
translated: Disease is the truth of suffering.üîΩThe origin of the disease is the truth of the source.

original: nad byung ba spangs nas nad med par gyur ba lta bu ni 'gog ba'i bden pa'o //
analyzed: nad byung ba spangs nas nad med par gyur ba lta bu ni 'gog ba'i bden pa'o //
translated: The abandonment of the disease when it arises is the truth of cessation.

original: nad spangs nas phyis mi skye ba lta bu ni lam gyi bden pa ste /
analyzed: nad spangs nas phyis mi skye ba lta bu ni lam gyi bden pa ste /
translated: The non-arising of the disease again after it has been abandoned is the truth of the path.

original: nad pas ni sman pa las de tsam zhig btsal bar bya bar zad do //
analyzed: nad pas ni sman pa las de tsam zhig btsal bar bya bar zad do //
translated: The sick person should seek only that much from the physician.

original: sman pas kyang de tsam zhig bstan par bya bar zad do //
analyzed: sman pas kyang de tsam zhig bstan par bya bar zad do //
translated: The physician should teach only that much.

original: de bas na 'phags pa'i bden pa ni lngar med de /
analyzed: de bas na 'phags pa'i bden pa ni lngar med de /
translated: Therefore, the noble truths are not five.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa sred pa'i zug rngu 'byin pa chen po bla na med pa yang de tsam zhig ston par zad do //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa sred pa'i zug rngu 'byin pa chen po bla na med pa yang de tsam zhig ston par zad do //
translated: The Tathagata, the great unsurpassed physician, teaches only that much.

original: bden pa shes pa la ma phyogs pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / mi ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams la ni rtags dang nyes dmigs bcu yod par rig par bya ste /
analyzed: bden pa shes pa la ma phyogs pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang / mi ldan pa'i dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams la ni rtags dang nyes dmigs bcu yod par rig par bya ste /
translated: Those who are not oriented toward the knowledge of the four truths, who do not possess realization and who are not true ascetics or brahmins have ten signs and disadvantages.üîΩThey are:üîΩ1) they are not considered to be ascetics by true ascetics,üîΩ2) they are not counted as ascetics by their words,üîΩ3) they are not completely liberated from all suffering such as birth that is rebirth,

original: yang dag pa'i dge sbyong rnams kyi @282b yid la dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / tshig gis dge sbyong zhes mi bgrang ba dang / yang srid par skye ba'i skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal las thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su ma grol ba dang /
analyzed: yang dag pa'i dge sbyong rnams kyi @282b yid la dge sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang / tshig gis dge sbyong zhes mi bgrang ba dang / yang srid par skye ba'i skye ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal las thams cad kyi thams cad du yongs su ma grol ba dang /
translated: 4) they are not completely liberated from the lower rebirths,üîΩ5) they become the cause for giving up the trainings,üîΩ6) they are not endowed with the supramundane qualities of a human being,üîΩ7) they are not endowed with the mundane qualities of a human being,

original: de bzhin du ngan song rnams las yongs su ma grol ba dang / bslab pa 'bul ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mi'i chos 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du ngan song rnams las yongs su ma grol ba dang / bslab pa 'bul ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i mi'i chos 'di lta ste /
translated: 8) they are not endowed with the qualities of a human being,üîΩ9) they are not endowed with the qualities of a brahmin,üîΩ10) they are not endowed with the qualities of an ascetic.

original: lam mam / lam gyi 'bras bu mya ngan las 'das pa mngon sum du byed pa'i skal ba med pa dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba'i sgo nas slob pa dang mi slob pa spangs te /
analyzed: lam mam / lam gyi 'bras bu mya ngan las 'das pa mngon sum du byed pa'i skal ba med pa dang / bde 'gror 'gro ba'i sgo nas slob pa dang mi slob pa spangs te /
translated: They lack the fortune to manifest the path or the result of the path, nirvana, and they lack the fortune to abandon the learner and nonlearner states by going to the happy realms.

original: 'di las phyi rol tu yon gnas gzhan tshol ba'i rgyur gyur ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa spangs te /üîΩ'di las phyi rol ba'i ston pa tshol ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong bas sdug bsngal ba'i yang sdug bsngal ba las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / tshe 'di la kun shes pas phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa nas /
analyzed: 'di las phyi rol tu yon gnas gzhan tshol ba'i rgyur gyur ba dang / mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gro ba'i sgo nas de bzhin gshegs pa spangs te / 'di las phyi rol ba'i ston pa tshol ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba dang / phyir mi 'ong bas sdug bsngal ba'i yang sdug bsngal ba las yang dag par 'da' ba dang / tshe 'di la kun shes pas phung po'i lhag ma dang bcas pa nas /
translated: They lack the fortune to abandon the Tathagata by going to nirvana and to seek other fields of merit outside of this doctrine, and they lack the fortune to seek other teachers outside of this doctrine.

original: sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i skal ba med do //
analyzed: sdug bsngal thams cad las yongs su grol bar 'gyur ba'i skal ba med do //
translated: Nonreturners lack the fortune to completely transcend suffering by means of this life and to be completely liberated from all suffering by means of the remainder of the aggregates and so on.

original: de las bzlog pa ni bden pa shes pa la mngon du phyogs pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi rtags dang phan yon yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: de las bzlog pa ni bden pa shes pa la mngon du phyogs pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi rtags dang phan yon yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: The opposite of these are the signs and benefits for those who are intent on knowing the truths and who possess realization.

original: bden pa shes pa la mngon du phyogs shing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyi ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'thob pa'i gnas dang / 'thob pa dang / 'thob pa'i gnas kyang rig par bya ste /
analyzed: bden pa shes pa la mngon du phyogs shing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa rnams kyi ni 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'thob pa'i gnas dang / 'thob pa dang / 'thob pa'i gnas kyang rig par bya ste /
translated: For those who are intent on knowing the truths and who desire to fully awaken, the basis of attainment, attainment, and the basis of attainment should be known through the four noble truths.

original: de la dad pas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba ni 'thob pa'i gnas so //
analyzed: de la dad pas legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la rab tu byung ba ni 'thob pa'i gnas so //
translated: Therein, going forth into the well-proclaimed Dharma and Vinaya out of faith is the basis of attainment.

original: dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bzhis bsdus pa nyan thos kyi byang chub dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub gsum po 'di dag ni 'thob pa yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: dge sbyong gi tshul gyi 'bras bu bzhis bsdus pa nyan thos kyi byang chub dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / bla na med pa'i byang chub gsum po 'di dag ni 'thob pa yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: These three - the enlightenment of the ≈õrƒÅvakas, the pratyekabuddhas, and the unsurpassed enlightenment - which are included in the four fruits of the spiritual life, should be known as the attainments.

original: snga ma bzhin du lan gsum du bzlas pa'i go rims bzhin du shes pa dang ; mthong ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa ni thabs yin par rig par bya'o //
analyzed: snga ma bzhin du lan gsum du bzlas pa'i go rims bzhin du shes pa dang ; mthong ba dang / mngon par rtogs pa ni thabs yin par rig par bya'o //
translated: As before, the knowledge, seeing, and realization in the sequence of the three repetitions is the method.
